title: Eterna Care
description: This is a blood bank management system that helps to manage the blood bank and the donor information.

body.raw: ## Introduction Eterna Care is a blood bank management system that helps to manage the blood bank and the donor information. It is a web-based application that can be used by blood banks to manage their blood bank and donor information. It is a user-friendly application that can be used by anyone with basic computer knowledge. It is a secure application that can be used to store sensitive information about donors and blood banks. ## Features - User authentication and authorization - Schedule appointments with laboratories - View and manage appointments - View and manage Blood-bank Inventory - Responsive UI for a seamless user experience ## Full tech stack - Frontend: React, Next.js, Tailwind CSS, Shadcn UI - Backend: Node.js, Next.js Server Action - Database: Prisma ORM with MongoDB - State Management: React Query (TanStack Query) - Validation: Zod, React Hook Form
